title: Rebirth of The Golden Marriage - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Dense Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Dreams   Engagement   Family Conflict   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Jealousy   Kidnappings   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Persistent Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Pretend Lovers   Reincarnation   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Secret Crush   Strong Love Interests   Unconditional Love   Wealthy Characters   Writers
author: Kun Cheng Xiong Mao   Trapped into a panda   困成熊猫
description:
In the last life, Lin Yu Tong chose to fly with Shen Jun for his own happiness, whereby he ended up creating an irreparable regret for a lifetime. However, such a contribution has not been able to exchange the happiness of a lifetime. Shen was derailed and Lin Yu Tong had an accident.

Reborn, he thought he could change a road and choose marriage. Even if there is no love, at least his family is still there.

But he did not expect that the man who has always been like a friend to suddenly say: Who said that we can’t have love?

Yeah, who said they can’t have love?

That being the case, don’t mention it …>
